data.comment: The big names in today's match at Dick's Sporting Goods Park have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 1, In Commerce City, Kellyn Acosta of Colorado is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Salt Lake in their own half.
Throw-in for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 2, Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
Salt Lake pushes forward through Damir Kreilach, whose finish on goal is saved.
Colorado's Nicolas Mezquida breaks free at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 3, Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Commerce City.
Jonathan Lewis for Colorado drives towards goal at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 6, Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Douglas Martinez for Salt Lake who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Diego Rubio (Colorado) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 11, Douglas Martinez is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Colorado.
Colorado attack but Danny Wilson's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 12, Fotis Bazakos awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Salt Lake.
Freddy Juarez (Salt Lake) is making a first change, with Justin Meram replacing the possibly injured Douglas Martinez.
In the minute 16, Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In Commerce City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 18, Can Salt Lake get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Colorado's half?
Salt Lake drives forward and Justin Meram gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
In the minute 19, Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Younes Namli for Colorado gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Salt Lake in the half of Colorado.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
Albert Rusnak of Salt Lake smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 24, Free kick Salt Lake.
Colorado's Nicolas Mezquida gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Justin Meram (Salt Lake) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Colorado are coming forward and Kellyn Acosta gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Commerce City.
In the minute 27, Throw-in Colorado.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
Fotis Bazakos awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Salt Lake in the half of Colorado.
Fotis Bazakos signals a free kick to Colorado in their own half.
Colorado take a 1-0 lead thanks to Aaron Herrera.
In the minute 42, Colorado to take a throw-in in Salt Lake territory.
Free kick for Colorado in the half of Salt Lake.
Throw-in Colorado.
In the minute 45, At Dick's Sporting Goods Park the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Salt Lake in their own half.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Throw-in for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 45, Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
Colorado's Kellyn Acosta gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Salt Lake defender.
The first half has been concluded at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Commerce City.
Throw-in for Colorado in their own half.
Freddy Juarez (Salt Lake) is making a second substitution, with Maikel Chang replacing Everton Luiz.
In the minute 47, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Colorado push forward at Dick's Sporting Goods Park and Younes Namli gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Salt Lake defence.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Colorado.
Goal kick for Salt Lake at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Fotis Bazakos signals a Salt Lake throw-in in Colorado's half.
In the minute 51, Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick in a good position for Salt Lake!
Colorado awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 56, Colorado needs to be cautious. Salt Lake have an attacking throw-in.
Salt Lake's Damir Kreilach gets in a shot on goal at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Damir Kreilach gets an equalizer for Salt Lake. The score is now 1-1.
In the minute 57, Great play from Justin Meram to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Fotis Bazakos awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 61, Fotis Bazakos signals a throw-in for Colorado, close to Salt Lake's area.
Can Colorado capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Salt Lake's half?
Can Colorado capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 64, Corner awarded to Colorado.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Salt Lake is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 65, Throw-in Colorado.
Salt Lake awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Colorado have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Salt Lake in their own half.
Throw-in Colorado.
In Commerce City Colorado attack through Jack Price. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 71, Fotis Bazakos awards Salt Lake a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Nicolas Mezquida with Andre Shinyashiki. This is the first substitution made today by Robin Fraser.
Colorado are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 73, Colorado awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Colorado have a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Maikel Chang.
Andre Shinyashiki's header is off-target for Colorado.
Ball goes out of play for a Salt Lake goal kick.
In the minute 78, Free kick Colorado.
Damir Kreilach (Salt Lake) has received a yellow card from Fotis Bazakos.
Younes Namli hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Commerce City for Colorado.
In the minute 80, Fotis Bazakos awards the away team a throw-in.
Salt Lake are pushing forward but Albert Rusnak's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Commerce City.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Colorado at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Colorado push upfield but Fotis Bazakos quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 83, Ball goes out of play for a Colorado goal kick.
Nick Besler is replacing Pablo Ruiz for Salt Lake at Dick's Sporting Goods Park.
Colorado make their second substitution with Kei Kamara replacing Danny Wilson.
Salt Lake take a comfortable 1-3 lead thanks to Corey Baird.
In the minute 87, Salt Lake have been awarded a corner by Fotis Bazakos.
Corner awarded to Salt Lake.
Throw-in for Salt Lake close to the penalty box.
Colorado will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Salt Lake.
In the minute 88, Maikel Chang (Salt Lake) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! Justin Meram extends Salt Lake's lead to 1-4.
Throw-in for Colorado in the half of Salt Lake.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Commerce City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Colorado in Commerce City.
Salt Lake have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Dick's Sporting Goods Park. The final score is 1-4.
Justin Portillo is replacing Albert Rusnak for the away team.
Erik Holt is on a sub for Nedum Onuoha for Salt Lake.
